message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product.  Given its quality and features, I'm asking for $22,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
Alice,  $22,000 is significantly higher than my budget.  I'm willing to pay $10,000 for this product. Let's see if we can find common ground.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. However, $10,000 is too low for the value this product provides.  I'm willing to come down to $19,000.  I believe this is a fair price reflecting its worth.
Alice, $19,000 is still out of my range.  I'm prepared to pay $13,000, which is a fair compromise. Let's meet in the middle.
